Reddy wrote:
> I also tried installing the patch required for the new process scheduler in
> Linux to test the java nio performance on it. I got the reference to the
> patch from the following url. I installed the 2.4.18 patch referred in it. I
> get a lot of compilation errors while doing make. I shall look at it;
> meanwhile, please let me know if you had got any other relevent patches.
> 
> http://www.uwsg.iu.edu/hypermail/linux/kernel/0207.0/0529.html

I think a number of recent commercial distros have backported the O(1)
scheduler themselves: Red Hat 8 and Suse 8.1, at least, maybe recent
Mandrakes. 

- Gordon
